about_the_game:
Step into the wonderful world of TCA2024 and experience the ups and downs of collector's life. As an experienced treasure connoisseur, you will search for rare treasures in every corner of the city, accumulating wealth and reputation through wisdom and strategy.

The core gameplay of the game includes:

Role play: Manage your reputation and collections, enhance your influence through appreciation, trading, and socializing.

Strategic management: Reasonably allocate time, money, and resources, and develop effective strategies to achieve goals.

Appreciation and Trading: Collecting appraisal fees by appreciating treasures, or obtaining profits by buying low and selling high. Each treasure has unique attributes and rarity that affect its market value.

Social interaction: Interacting with roles such as judges, businessmen, and other collectors to obtain favorable information or establish relationships.

Multi Ending System: Based on your choices and strategies, the game will present different endings, testing your decision-making abilities.

name: 实至名归TCA2024（Yes or No?）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7(64-Bit)
  • Processor: i3-530 2.93GHZ 2 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-Bit)
  • Processor: i7-7700k 4.2GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Yes or No？ is a unique semi simulation management role-playing game, where players will transform into a somewhat famous collector and embark on a challenging and strategic treasure appreciation journey.
